Phrase: --My son. Can you hear me?
I see you've managed to get the Mist Train running. The people of Iris Cloud will trust the fate of the world to the Train you run.

It was the same in the beginning with me. I have the power to run the Mist Train, though not as much as you do. I thought I would run the Train with my friends and go on a journey to clear the Mists of this world.
But along the way we changed our ways. Because I couldn't control the Mist Train perfectly...
We were doing our own research. We approached the Giant Tree and saw the Truth of this world.
My son.
Please, do not lose sight the Mist that needs to be cleared. Do not lose sight of what you need to do.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: Confirmed route map secured. We will now move to phase two.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: The Giant Tree Railroad has regained seven-tenths of its functionality. The Magic Train is now able to enter the area.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: When you wake up, your mind and body might be severely damaged. Nevertheless, you must go.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: You will go to Ricardo and save the Giant Tree of St. Iris. Follow the guidance of the Giant Tree and I will back you up fully.

Name: Samantha
Phrase: If one Giant Tree dies, the pollution will accelerate. Eliminate the Poison and bring harmony to Iris Cloud.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: This is the Portal we followed Mary through.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: So we got out. We didn't go through the Terminal, it flew us all the way to the exit.

Name: Islington
Phrase: You've all returned! Medics, prepare to treat the injured immediately!
To get out of the weapons factory inside the Terminal, the Special Steel Squad jumped through Mary's Gate.

As we were making their way through the interstellar realm. Our Samantha guide, appeared and talked to us about the 'Guidance of the Giant Tree'... We jumped out of the gate into that forest where the Portal was located.
But when we went outside the door, we were surprised to find a large number of Out-Siders and Islington waiting for us. What on earth were they doing with such a large group?

Name: Islington
Phrase: Thank God... Everyone is alive. For once I feared that you weren't going to make it...

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Islington, what's going on with such a large group of people?

Name: Islington
Phrase: You're asking what's going on? The nerve, you people haven't returned for ages, so we were about to proceed with Plan B.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Plan B? Our mission's accomplished as planned. A little too hasty for you, don't you think?

Name: Islington
Phrase: What are you talking about? You haven't been back for a week, what do you mean by 'as planned'?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: A week!?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: We were in there for half a day at most, weren't we?

Name: Putra
Phrase: Did the flow of time change when we were moving through the Portal?

Name: Islington
Phrase: Well, it's not impossible I suppose~ The things created by the Giant Tree defy all common sense. We even had people who wandered through the Phantom Mist and came back decades later looking exactly the same.

Name: Islington
Phrase: So? Did you find the route map?

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Yes, we did. It's not quite what we thought it was, but...

Name: Mary
Phrase: Queensway, you alright? You look under the weather.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: ...No, I'm not okay.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Of course it's not all right. We left two behind, didn't we!?

Name: Mary
Phrase: It can't be helped.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: It can't be helped? That's not the word you'd use to describe the problem, is it?

Name: Mary
Phrase: There are sacrifices to be made in battle. You don't always get everything without losing nothing.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: 'Were their sacrifices necessary to save this world? Was there no way to do something about it?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: We got Miss Yuuzen involved. If we could have stopped Canaria's interference. Miss Yuuzen wouldn't have to sacrifice herself...

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Queensway.
Blackfriar intervened between Mary and Queensway. She grabbed Queensway by her collar and brings her face so close that the tips of their noses touched each other,
Her expression is completely different to when she strangled Finchley.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Then why don't you try going back and stop her then? Cut your glamourous tosh if you have neither ability nor action to do so.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Was there a way to do something about it? Yes, there was. There were three ways. I'll tell you about them now, better get your pen ready and note them down.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: One. Kill Canaria. It's the quickest way. But you can't do it. Why? Because she will kill you first before you kill her. Queensway, you can't beat Canaria at your current skill level.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Two. Restrain her mobility, so she cannot resist. After that, tie her up with ropes and carry her back to our base. All of this must be done instantly. If you want to save Canaria too, this is the only way. But you can't do it. Why? Because this is much more difficult than the first method.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Three. Use Gate magic in front of Mary and rescue her. But you can't do it. Why? Because you don't have that ability.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Ghh...

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Were those two sacrifices necessary to save this world? Queensway, do you know any shame asking that in the presence of an Out-Sider?

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: And now you're speechless. Why? Because I won't allow you to utter drivel. Remember, any more of this nonsense, and I'll pummel you, have that carved into your thick skull.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Blackfriar, that's enough. Leave her alone.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: No, I cannot. If you're going to take her to the Giant Tree, you need to teach her properly. Otherwise, we're going to be slowed down by her constant babbling and whining after every battle.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Mary, your pampering is not doing Queensway any favours. You know what the Giant Tree is like. Perhaps you even know what's going to happen to us later.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: You know all these, and yet you still drag a kid who cannot even fulfil her knightly duties to the Giant Tree, that's too cruel even for me. Can you please educate her well? Because after this, you will be under Conductor's supervision, and is out of my sight.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Mary is under Conductor's?

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Yes. When this operation is over, Mary will ride the Mist Train as a member of the SSS. A knight as tough as she is is an important asset.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Learn your lesson, Queensway. Don't let Mary take over your driving seat.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Even I knew that in my head...

Name: Mary
Phrase: If you knew, you shouldn't have said it. You're not so childish to the point that you don't know why Yuuzen was there, are you?

Name: Mary
Phrase: Yuuzen wanted to help me and Ricardo. Just like Ricardo and I helped Yuuzen in the past.

Name: Mary
Phrase: You must have had a cold head when Out-Siders were mentioned. Just as the knights have a role to play, so do Yuuzen and I have a role to play. Please understand that. For your sake and mine.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: A knight's role is to protect his people. To be the shield and sword of the Divine Child in order to save St. Iris.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Yes. You risked your life to protect Conductor. Yuuzen did the same thing.

Name: Mary
Phrase: ...But I want you to know that I'm relieved that you weren't just thinking only of Yuuzen, but also of Canaria.

Name: Mary
Phrase: You said 'we left two behind'. Thank you for saying that. I like that about you. I hope you keep that kindness in your heart.

Name: Islington
Phrase: I see, I kind of see where you're going with this~ Thanks for your report!

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: Everything seems to be fine with Mary Rosegarden. You can add her to the SSS as planned.

Name: Islington
Phrase: However, I'll consider this a special case, even if there are problems, we still must tie her to the Train and let her go at it.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: And thus, my hands are off this table. With Mary and Queensway together, well, they'll be fine. And your favourite Yoshino is excellent too.

Name: Islington
Phrase: Oh, one minute, Blackfriar.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: What is it?

Name: Islington
Phrase: Thanks for everything, including what you just said. You're the reason I'm able to keep command of the Out-Siders.

Name: Blackfriar
Phrase: You're welcome. The Divine Child of Trust gave the order. It's only natural we obey your command.

Name: Islington
Phrase: As if. Jeez, this is why the Out-Siders are such a handful.
